price: (19) Have they not considered how Allāh begins creation and then repeats it? Indeed that, for Allāh, is easy.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ يُبۡدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw kayfa yub'di-u al-lahu al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu inna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīrun
